import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.InputStreamReader;
import java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException;
import java.net.HttpURLConnection;
import java.net.MalformedURLException;
import java.net.URL;
import java.net.URLEncoder; 

/**
* 发送短信基础类
* @author administration
*
*/
public class SmsBase {
private String Uid="本站用户名";
private String Key="接口安全密码";
private String smsMob="手机号码";
private String smsText="短信内容";

public String SendSms(String mobile,String content) throws UnsupportedEncodingException{ 
HttpURLConnection httpconn = null;
String result="-20";
String memo = smsText.length()<63?smsText.trim():smsText.trim().substring(0, 63);
StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
sb.append("www.jxtsms.com/");
sb.append(Uid);
sb.append("&Key=").append(Key);
sb.append("&smsMob=").append(smsMob);
sb.append("&smsText=").append(URLEncoder.encode(memo, "utf-8"));
try {
URL url = new URL(sb.toString());
httpconn = (HttpURLConnection) url.openConnection();
BufferedReader rd = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(httpconn.getInputStream()));
result = rd.readLine();
rd.close();
} catch (MalformedURLException e) {
// TODO Auto-generated catch block
e.printStackTrace();
} catch (IOException e) {
// TODO Auto-generated catch block
e.printStackTrace();
} finally{
if(httpconn!=null){
httpconn.disconnect();
httpconn=null;
}

}
return result;
}
}
